Hero.title: Discover the World of
Hero.description: Explore and learn mathematics through interactive, visual, and engaging examples. Enhance your skills with fun and challenging problems tailored for all levels.

steps.title: Choose a Chapter
steps.description: Browse our wide range of math chapters and select the one that interests you.

steps.title: Interactive Lessons
steps.description: Engage with our interactive lessons, complete with visualizations and practice problems.

steps.title: Track Progress
steps.description: Monitor your progress and earn achievements as you advance through the course.
